name: Ineptris
overview: A Tetris clone with "specials" and lots of other additions. Ineptris is THE ultimate Tetris. Made by Robert Kihl and Martin Gunnarsson of Snarl-up Software and released as "mailware" ( a type of interactive freeware email or snail-mail something...anything to the creators) in 1997. Special blocks are employed in this game and if finish a line with a special block something good or bad will happen. Several tunes to choose when playing Ineptris including Rock 'n' Roll, Slow Rock and Metal. There is also a Scorebandit, a lever next to your score just like the ones in Vegas. Pull it and see what happens!
